metadata.title: Kubernetes Service Mesh
metadata.description: Review production best practices for all Kubernetes installation types and learn cloud-specific configurations for deploying Consul on different cloud providers. Practice registering, securing, and observing services deployed with Kubernetes.

collection.name: Service Mesh on Kubernetes
collection.description: Review production best practices for all Kubernetes installation types and learn cloud-specific configurations for deploying Consul on different cloud providers. Practice registering, securing, and observing services deployed with Kubernetes.

tutorials.name: Consul on Kubernetes reference architecture
tutorials.description: Learn recommended practices and reference architecture for deploying Consul service mesh on Kubernetes.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Consul and Kubernetes deployment guide
tutorials.description: Install and configure a new Consul datacenter on Kubernetes.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Secure applications with service sidecar proxies
tutorials.description: Deploy applications on Kubernetes using Consul service mesh to encrypt and control traffic between services with mTLS.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Secure Consul and registered services on Kubernetes
tutorials.description: Secure Consul on Kubernetes using gossip encryption, TLS certificates, Access Control Lists, and Consul intentions.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Secure service mesh communication across Kubernetes clusters
tutorials.description: Secure service-to-service communication across multiple Kubernetes clusters with Consul's mesh gateway feature.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Layer 7 observability with Prometheus, Grafana, and Kubernetes
tutorials.description:
Collect and visualize layer 7 metrics from services in your Kubernetes cluster
using Consul service mesh, Prometheus, and Grafana.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Manage Consul with Kubernetes custom resource definitions (CRDs)
tutorials.description: Register service intentions with Consul service mesh to control traffic flow by HTTP header, method, or path.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Consul Service Discovery and Service Mesh on Minikube
tutorials.description: Deploy Consul locally on Minikube and learn how to manage your Consul datacenter with the  Consul CLI, UI, and API. Finally, configure Consul service mesh for services in your Kubernetes cluster.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Consul Service Discovery and Mesh on Kubernetes in Docker (kind)
tutorials.description: Deploy Consul locally on kind and learn how to manage your Consul datacenter with the  Consul CLI, UI, and API. Finally, configure Consul service mesh for services in your Kubernetes cluster.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Deploy Consul on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS)
tutorials.description: Deploy Consul on AKS and learn how to manage your Consul datacenter with the  Consul CLI, UI, and API.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Deploy Consul on Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE)
tutorials.description: Deploy Consul on GKE and learn how to manage your Consul datacenter with the  Consul CLI, UI, and API.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.description: Deploy Consul on EKS and learn how to manage your Consul datacenter with the  Consul CLI, UI, and API.

tutorials.description: Deploy Consul on OpenShift with the official Helm chart and deploy services into Consul's service mesh.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Deploy federated multi-cloud Kubernetes clusters
tutorials.description: Use Terraform to provision Kubernetes clusters in the Azure and AWS clouds, deploy Consul Helm charts enabling Consul federation, and deploy an example application on both clusters.

product.description: Learn to provision infrastructure with HashiCorp Terraform

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Multi-cluster applications with Consul Enterprise admin partitions
tutorials.description: Learn how to deploy containerized applications across networks, clusters, and partitions using admin partitions with Consul Enterprise and Kubernetes.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Vault as secrets management for Consul
tutorials.description: Secure Consul on Kubernetes using gossip encryption, TLS certificates, and  service mesh certificates using Vault as secrets management.

product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

product.name: Vault
product.description: Learn about secrets management and data protection with HashiCorp Vault.

tutorials.name: Deploy Consul on Windows nodes in Kubernetes
tutorials.description: Deploy Consul on Windows Nodes in Kubernetes to explore Consul's core  features and functionality.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Migrate your services to service mesh with permissive mTLS
tutorials.description: Temporarily enable sidecar proxies to allow both mTLS and non-mTLS traffic to accelerate onboarding and migrating your services to Consul service mesh.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

tutorials.name: Deploy seamless canary deployments with service splitters
tutorials.description: Use Consul service splitters and service resolvers to gradually and safely  promote your services. Split layer-7 (L7) traffic, using Envoy proxies  configured by Consul, to roll out a new version of a service. You can also use this for zero-downtime, blue-green, and canary deployments.

product.name: Consul
product.description: Learn how to run service discovery and a service mesh with Consul.

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.

alertBanner.text: Our community conference is taking place in San Francisco and online October 10-12.
